TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi sealed AxHost/AboutBoxDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 代表將顯示 ActiveX 控制項之 [關於] 對話方塊的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will display an ActiveX control's About dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供您的 ActiveX 控制項的相關方塊即將顯示時收到通知的能力。The provides you the ability to be notified when the ActiveX control's About box is going to be displayed. [關於] 對話方塊顯示之前執行程式碼加入至委派方法。Code added to the delegate method is executed before the About box is displayed. 當您建立委派，必須識別的方法將處理的 ActiveX 控制項的關於對話方塊顯示，如果有的話。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the display of an ActiveX control's About dialog box if it has one. 若要與您處理常式關聯的方法，將加入至方法的委派的執行個體。To associate the method with your handler, add an instance of the delegate to the method. 除非您移除委派，呼叫方法時，會呼叫處理常式。The handler is called whenever the method is called, unless you remove the delegate. 如需委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫建構函式，而和方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 格式編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼假設您已建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`參數來產生包裝函式類別，可供編輯。This code assumes you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 這會顯示程式碼只在 C# 語法，也就是做為唯一語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax as that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]
